Welcome to the official Quarry Rush User Manual!#

It’s a new day. It’s your time to shine! It’s your time to code!

Welcome to your first day at Church Inc. or Turing Co. as a robotics specialist! If you are reading this specialized MOB-BOT User Manual (documentation), it means that you’ve got the guts and the brains to control the state-of-the-art proprietary technology: MOB-BOT - the Mining Operating Buddy Bot!

Refer to this manual anytime you have questions about your short time here. If the manual doesn’t answer your question, call a developer over and they’ll answer your question!
